post_excerpt:
Generic name

  • Alfuzosin

Strength

  • 100 mg tablet

Indication

Management of pain and inflammation in
  • Osteoarthritis
  • Rheumatoid arthritis
  • Ankylosing spondylitis

Dosage

  • Adult: 200 mg daily 12 hourly.
  • Children: It is not recommended
